testcaseName: Pneumococcal: Patient has received PCV13 and PPSV23
generalDescription: This test case describes the assessment of a patient > age 65 years with a history of PCV13 and PPSV23 vaccine, that no additional doses are recommended.  The series is complete.
reasonForChange: New test case for version 2.0 which expanded scope into Adult recommendations. Update due to  MMWR (9/4/2015 / Vol.64 / No. 34) changing the minimal and recommended interval from PCV13 to PPSV23 in adults 65+ from 6-12 months to 1 year.
